data.name: confirm_system_commands
data.value: Show a dialog to confirm system commands

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_confirmation
data.comment: Request confirmation

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_emptyrecyclebin
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of emptying the recycle bin on your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_emptyrecyclebin_description
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of emptying the recycle bin on your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_hibernate
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a hibernating your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_hibernate_confirmation
data.value: You are about to put this computer into hibernation, are you sure?
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a hibernating your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_hibernate_description
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a hibernating your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_lock
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a locking your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_lock_confirmation
data.value: You are about to lock this computer, are you sure?
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a locking your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_lock_description
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a locking your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_plugin_description
data.comment: This should align to the actions in Windows relating to shutting down, signing out, locking, sleeping, restarting, emptying the recycle bin, and hibernating your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_plugin_name
data.comment: Windows operating system commands.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_restart_computer
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a restarting your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_restart_computer_confirmation
data.value: You are about to restart this computer, are you sure?
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a restarting your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_restart_computer_description
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a restarting your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_shutdown_computer
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a shutting down your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_shutdown_computer_confirmation
data.value: You are about to shut down this computer, are you sure?
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a shutting down your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_shutdown_computer_description
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a shutting down your computer.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_sign_out
data.comment: This should align to the action in windows of a signing out back to the lock screen.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_sign_out_confirmation
data.value: You are about to sign out of this computer, are you sure?
data.comment: This should align to the action in windows of a signing out back to the lock screen.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_sign_out_description
data.comment: This should align to the action in windows of a signing out back to the lock screen.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_sleep
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a making your computer go to sleep.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_sleep_confirmation
data.value: You are about to put this computer to sleep, are you sure?
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a making your computer go to sleep.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_sleep_description
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows of a making your computer go to sleep.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_uefi
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows Recovery Environment that restart into uefi settings.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_uefi_confirmation
data.value: You are about to reboot this computer into UEFI Firmware Settings menu, are you sure?
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows Recovery Environment that restart into uefi settings.

data.name: Microsoft_plugin_sys_uefi_description
data.value: Reboot computer into UEFI Firmware Settings (Requires administrative permissions.)
data.comment: This should align to the action in Windows Recovery Environment that restart into uefi settings.

data.name: Use_localized_system_commands
data.value: Use localized system commands instead of English ones
